Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 104th overall pick, by Baltimore in 2007...
Injured on 5/30/2008 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 2-3 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/5/2010, off Sean Marshall (MIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/4/2010, off Gil Meche (NYN)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 2017...
Injured on 5/8/2018 with a Torn Hip Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 4/15/2020 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Baltimore to Colorado on 5/30/2020 (Going to COL: P J. Kelly, CF C. Curtis, C B. Loranger. Going to BAL: 3B R. Pena, 3B M. Horta)...
